tool.name: Tree Relabeler
tool.description: Relabels the tips of a newick formatted tree.

param.name: treefile
param.label: The newick formated tree file to be relabeled:

param.name: tabfile
param.label: The tab separated file containing the current labels and the info to be added to the labels

param.name: delim
param.label: Delimiter for new tip labels (space, _, etc)
param.help: If left blank, labels of updated tips will be separated by spaces.

tool.help:
What it does ============
This tool provides a means for relabeling the tips of a newick formatted tree.
It takes a newick format tree file to modify tip labels and a tab-delimited file containing current tip labels and additional information to add to the tips in 2 or more columns.
Usage =====
Header row of the tab delimited file must start with a '#'. An example is below:
- #label outbreak year location - orgs1 outbreak1 year1 location1 - orgs2 outbreak2 year2 location2
and so on.
The information in the tab file is inserted into the tree file so the new information will appear on the tip labels.
Input =====
Newick format tree
Tab delimted file
Desired delimiter for updated tip labels
